summary: Diff implements multiple bootstrap hardening changes: Layout now shows BootstrapErrorScreen on actor/profile/admin-check errors with a retry sequence, loading UI is gated by active in-flight states, role gating avoids indefinite spinners, and the service worker is updated to network-first navigation with a bumped cache version. One unrequested enhancement (periodic SW update polling) appears to have been added.

hallucinated_features.description: Periodic service worker update polling (registration.update() every minute) and additional updatefound/controllerchange logging in the SW registration flow.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4 requests network-first navigation behavior and cache version bump; it does not request periodic polling for SW updates.
